left_text: Front tibia with apical spine long, curved posteriorly; S2 not depressed medially, without dense covering of hair; hypostomal area with polished, impunctate area (southern Africa)
right_text: Front tibia with apical spine short, straight; S2 depressed medially, densely covered with velvety hair; hypostomal area without polished, impunctate area

left_text: Metapleuron with large dorsal projection; axilla produced to acute angle (Kenya)
right_text: Metapleuron without dorsal projection; axilla rounded (southern Africa)
